lines.text: Sub. : a) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Working Results for the quarter/half year ended 30th September, 2017. b) Decisions at the meeting(s).

paragraphs.text: Sub. : a) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Working Results for the quarter/half year ended 30th September, 2017. b) Decisions at the meeting(s).

lines.text: We have to inform you that the Board of Directors of Jain Irrigation Systems Limited have met on 10 November 2017 at Mumbai (India) and considered, approved and recommended the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Working Results for the quarter/half year ended 30 September, 2017.

paragraphs.text: We have to inform you that the Board of Directors of Jain Irrigation Systems Limited have met on 10 November 2017 at Mumbai (India) and considered, approved and recommended the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Working Results for the quarter/half year ended 30 September, 2017.

lines.text: We attach herewith the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Working Results of Jain Irrigation Systems Limited (JISL) for the quarter/half year ended 30" September, 2017 in the prescribed format together with the notes duly signed by the Managing Director of JISL and Limited Review Report dated 10% November, 2017 of the Statutory Auditors of JISL.

paragraphs.text: We attach herewith the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Working Results of Jain Irrigation Systems Limited (JISL) for the quarter/half year ended 30" September, 2017 in the prescribed format together with the notes duly signed by the Managing Director of JISL and Limited Review Report dated 10% November, 2017 of the Statutory Auditors of JISL.

lines.text: Considering the enormous potential of the food processing business, the Board has asked the management to explore an IPO of its food subsidiary “Jain Farm Fresh Foods Limited” (“JFFFL”) in the next fiscal year. JFFFL is a global leader in the processed Fruit & Vegetable space. It has ambitious plans for growth.

paragraphs.text: Considering the enormous potential of the food processing business, the Board has asked the management to explore an IPO of its food subsidiary “Jain Farm Fresh Foods Limited” (“JFFFL”) in the next fiscal year. JFFFL is a global leader in the processed Fruit & Vegetable space. It has ambitious plans for growth.

lines.text: JISL’s Chief Financial Officer (“CFO”) Mr. Manoj Lodha has resigned due to health reasons. He has provided excellent leadership to the finance function over a long period and was with our group for more than 19 years. The Board, on recommendation of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee and Audit Committee has appointed Mr. Atul Jain (currently the Joint Managing Director) as interim CFO. He has been with our group for more than 25 years and has been involved in building & nurturing all businesses of our group in India & abroad. Our group will initiate a process to evaluate candidates for the position.

paragraphs.text: JISL’s Chief Financial Officer (“CFO”) Mr. Manoj Lodha has resigned due to health reasons. He has provided excellent leadership to the finance function over a long period and was with our group for more than 19 years. The Board, on recommendation of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee and Audit Committee has appointed Mr. Atul Jain (currently the Joint Managing Director) as interim CFO. He has been with our group for more than 25 years and has been involved in building & nurturing all businesses of our group in India & abroad. Our group will initiate a process to evaluate candidates for the position.

lines.text: Please receive the above in order, take on record and acknowledge.
